section.title: Removing Policy Profiles from a Resource Pool

procedure.title: To Remove Policy Profiles from a Resource Pool

step.para: Navigate to InfrastructureResource Pools, check the resource pools you need to remove the policy profiles from.
From the Select Policy Profiles area, click on the triangle next to a desired policy profile to expand it and see its member policies.
Uncheck the policy profiles you need to remove. It turns blue to show that its assignment state has changed.
